boundary_protection.description: Defends personal boundaries, autonomy, or dignity when threatened.
boundary_protection.activation: Triggered by criticism, disrespect, injustice, or perceived dominance.
behaviors: escalation to regain perceived balance of power

peace_preservation.description: Reduces tension through appeasement, harmony-seeking, or emotional diffusion.
peace_preservation.activation: Triggered by rising conflict intensity, relational instability, or risk of losing connection.

escape_urge.description: Seeks psychological or physical distance to reduce overwhelm.
escape_urge.activation: Triggered by overstimulation, emotional pressure, or fear of escalation.

stability_restoration.description: Attempts to restore internal or relational equilibrium.
stability_restoration.activation: Triggered by uncertainty, chaotic interactions, or unpredictable emotional states in others.
